00019 enum DrmXmlFormat {
00020     // Xml REL Data
00021     DrmRightsXml,
00022     // Wbxml REL Data
00023     DrmRightsWbxml,
00024     // None
00025     DrmRightsNone
00026 };
00027 
00028 // Basic Drm Rel parser
00029 class DrmRelParser {
00030 
00031     friend class XmlParserRel;
00032     friend class WbxmlParserRel;
00033 
00034     public :
00035 
00036         enum DrmVersion {
00037             // Drm version 1.0
00038             Drm_v_1_0 ,
00039             Drm_v_None
00040         };
00041 
00042         DrmRelParser(DrmRightsObject& ro, const UINT8* rights_xml_buffer,DrmXmlFormat xml_format) : m_ro(ro) {          
00043             m_xml_format = xml_format;          
00044             m_rights_xml_data = rights_xml_buffer;
00045          }
00046 
00047         DrmRelParser(DrmRightsObject& ro, const BinData* wbxml_data,DrmXmlFormat wbxml_format) : m_ro(ro) {         
00048             m_xml_format = wbxml_format;            
00049             m_wbxml_data = wbxml_data;
00050          }
00051 
00055         INT32 Parse();
00056 
00059         DrmVersion GetDrmVersion();
00060 
00063         void SetDrmVersion(String& version){
00064             if(version.compare("1.0"))
00065                 m_drm_version = Drm_v_1_0;
00066             else
00067                 m_drm_version = Drm_v_None; // Should generate error and return according to spec
00068         }
00069 
00070     protected :
00074         INT32 ParseXmlRel();
00075         DrmStatus ParseWbxmlRel(); // Phase 3
00076         DrmRightsObject& GetRightsObject()
00077         {
00078             return m_ro;
00079         }
00080         
00081 
00082     private :   
00083         // Reference of rights object in container  
00084         DrmRightsObject& m_ro;
00085 
00088         const UINT8* m_rights_xml_data;
00089 
00090         // BinData interface for WBXML REL data.
00091         const BinData* m_wbxml_data;
00092 
00094         DrmXmlFormat m_xml_format;  // needs to be stored because parse can be called at any time, right now only XML and WBXML
00095                                      // change to UINT16 etc later when more formats are available
00096 
00097         DrmVersion m_drm_version;   // DrmVersion 1-v1.0, 2-v2.0 ...        
00098 };// DrmRelParser
